1.1.name: wordpress/adsense-privacy-policy
1.1.description:
See the plugin home page for details, but here's the basic scoop. After enabling this plugin, create a static page to hold the privacy policy. You can use the "Create Page" button on the plugin options page to do it for you. On that page, embed this comment:

You must edit the page in HTML mode (don't use the visual editor) in order for the comment to be interpreted properly.

When the page is displayed, a privacy policy is generated and displayed in place of the comment. If you see the comment just as you typed it above, you need to edit the page in HTML mode.
